items.q: How much does a project usually cost?
items.a: Cost depends on scope and complexity. We provide a transparent phased estimate after a focused discovery call.

items.q: How quickly can we launch MVP?
items.a: Most MVPs go live within 2-6 weeks depending on integrations, required platforms, and feature depth.

items.q: Do you work with existing in-house teams?
items.a: Yes. We plug into your workflow, coordinate with your leads, and deliver as an accountable partner.
Through prioritized backlog and sprint planning. Every change is evaluated for impact on timeline and budget.

items.q: Who owns the code and infrastructure?
items.a: You do. Repositories, access rights, and infrastructure remain under your ownership.
